Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Analyze the Data Event Log order_event_log: Case 1001: Standard flow. Case 1002: Register Confirm Shipment Ship Credit Validate Invoice Payment. Anomaly 1 Early Confirmation: Confirm Shipment before Perform Credit Check. Case 1003: Register Credit Ship Invoice Confirm Payment. Anomaly 2 Missing Stock Validation: Ship Goods directly after Credit Check skipping Validate Stock. Case 1004: Register Receive Payment Issue Invoice Confirm Shipment Ship Goods. Anomaly 3 Order of Operations: Payment before Invoicing. Anomaly 4 Immediate Payment No Invoice before. Anomaly 5 Missing Activities: No Credit Check or Validate Stock.

Name: Pattern Recognition - IND
Text: Analyze the Data Order Info orders: Case 1002 is priority order. Case 1004 has high value 3000.00.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Formulate Hypotheses: Hypothesis 1 Process Deviation Order 1002 Confirmation before Credit Check. Reason: High-priority or system bug. Hypothesis 2 Missing Workflow Step Order 1003 Skipping Validate Stock. Reason: System error or manual override. Hypothesis 3 Incorrect Sequence Policy Order 1004 Payment before Invoicing skipping Credit Check. Reason: Customer agreement or data error.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Draft SQL Queries: Query for Hypothesis 1 cases where Confirm Shipment before Perform Credit Check using self-join timestamps. Query for Hypothesis 2 cases with Credit Check and Ship Goods but no Validate Stock using CTE MAX timestamps. Query for Hypothesis 3 cases where Receive Payment before Issue Invoice and missing steps.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Refine SQL Queries PostgreSQL specific: Refinement for Hypothesis 1 self-join Confirm Shipment timestamp less than Credit Check. Refinement for Hypothesis 2 CTE audit credit_time not null stock_time null ship_time not null. Refinement for Hypothesis 3 self-join Payment before Invoice and EXCEPT for missing Credit Check.

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Final Polish of the Response: Self-Correction during drafting: Re-check Order 1003 skipped Validate Stock and Confirm Shipment initial. Order 1004 skips Credit and Stock. Categorize anomalies: 1 Process Orchestration Error 1002. 2 Missing Workflow Activity 1003. 3 Fundamental Process Deviation 1004. Refine queries: self-join for early confirmation payment before invoice EXCEPT for missing steps.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Final Output Generation: Structure response Anomaly Detection Hypothesis SQL Query. Use example cases. Ensure valid PostgreSQL. Additional check join orders for high-value correlation but stick primarily to event log.
